title: World Creation Myths
description: Discover how different cultures explained the origins of the world

questions.question: In the Bible's Book of Genesis, how many days did God take to create the world?
In Hindu mythology, which god is known as the Creator of the universe?
In Norse mythology, the world was created from the body of which primordial giant?
In Chinese mythology, which figure is said to have separated heaven and earth?
In ancient Egyptian mythology, which god emerged from the primordial waters of Nun to begin creation?
In Greek mythology, what was the primordial void that existed before all creation?
In the Babylonian creation epic 'Enuma Elish,' who slays the goddess Tiamat to create the world?
In Japanese mythology, which divine pair created the islands of Japan?
In Aboriginal Australian belief, what is the period of creation called?
In the Maori creation myth, what are the names of the Earth Mother and Sky Father?
In Finnish mythology, the world was created from the fragments of what object?
In the Mayan creation story 'Popol Vuh,' what material were the successful humans finally made from?
In Zoroastrian belief, who is the supreme creator god?
In the Yoruba creation myth, which deity was sent to create dry land on the primordial waters?
In Inuit mythology, the world was believed to have emerged from what?
options: Darkness, with no sun or moon at first
